entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
